channel.title: when you will fix this bug
channel.description: whgen u fix the apparmor massage bug?

item.title: when you will fix this bug
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Are you certain that you typed it correctly and added it in the correct way as shown on the linked Github page? Because otherwise I’m not certain whether there is any other way we might be able to help you.

Also, a release date for Whonix 14 is, as far as I can tell, not really set in stone.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: when you will fix this bug

item.source: when you will fix this bug

item.title: when you will fix this bug
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Did you launch nano/gedit with sudo? Because for this change to take place, you need to be root.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic

item.source: when you will fix this bug

item.title: when you will fix this bug
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Like @Patrick mentioned in the thread, either ignore it, or try the mentioned fix which consist of adding:

/etc/perl/sitecustomize.pl r,

to the file you may find in “etc/apparmor.d/usr.bin.whonixcheck”.

Details may be found here: https://github.com/Whonix/whonixcheck/commit/0dea981efb7728e9618915fd2ec7d9e71b25f601

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
